features: 🌻POWERFUL PALM SIZED WALKING THEATER: This cute fashionable projector has white exterior with slight matt finish (7 x 5 x 2.5 inches). It can not only serve as your walking theater which is easy to carry around for traveling or fit nicely with your room but also an ideal gift choice for your family or friend, adult or kids. This projector is small but will deliver even better brightness and focus than its larger counterparts!

🌻2023 UPGRADED MINI BLUETOOTH PROJECTOR: With latest 9500 Lumens and 1080P Full HD resolution supported, PURSHE portable projector brings you a clear and sharp detailed images. Adopted the latest color reproduction technology, every details on the screen is accurately restored to ensure a real and color-vibrant viewing effect. With its Bluetooth 5.1 technology, it is easier and more fun to enjoy immersive audio experience without wires.

🌻HIFI STEREO SOUND & ADVANCED FAN COOLING SYSTEM: Built-in 3W cavity speakers produce clearer and louder sound. Six-layer LCD glass lens equipped with advanced cooling system minimizes power consumption and extends the life of the bulb up to 50,000 hours. No more loud humming sound during movie time.

🌻A BREEZE TO SET UP: Plug and play your favorite devices, including Smartphone/Laptop/TV Stick/PS4/DVD player/Tablet/TV box and more. Using aux port to connect soundbar and external speakers for immersive atmosphere. Perfect for outdoor/indoor movie night, family beach trip, camping, BBQ gatherings. It is definitely a solid-built mini portable projector that will work wonders for your life!

🌻TRANSFORM YOUR PATIO INTO MOVIE THEATER: No time to go to the actual movie theater? Create your outdoor movie theater by simply casting content from your devices to 200'' giant screen with this portable projector. Get your popcorn ready for the perfect movie night with your family and friends!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PURSHE 2023 Latest Model HI-01 Portable Projector Compact and Mighty: This small projector is backed up with manufacturer that has decades of experience. Small product dimensions of 2.2*4.5*6.1inch produces high 1280*720 native resolution and display image max to 200inch and 9500 lumens. Advanced and latest chip improves the clarity and smoothness of the image, allowing more delicate color gradients to be displayed.

Quieter Fan and Less Overheats: Six-layer LCD glass lens equipped with advanced cooling system minimizes power consumption and extends the life of the bulb up to 50,000 hours. No need to put up with loud humming sound during movie time. Time to put away your larger more expensive projector that makes so much noises and overheats.

A Breeze to Set Up: This mini projector is equipped with a variety of inputs like HDMI, USB, AV and TF. So plug and play your TV stick to this projector, enjoy endless entertainment whenever you want. (Notes: Copyright videos like Netflix, Prime video need to be connected to a TV stick or HDMI cable to enjoy.) Its Bluetooth 5.1 function enables connecting Bluetooth speakers and earphones wirelessly. Enjoy immersive sound experience without dealing with different wires.

Fashionable and Solid-built: This projector has a cute white outlook. Different from other projectors with plain plastic exterior on the market, it has a slight matt finish. You will love it when you touch it.

Your Mini Mighty Walking Theater For Daily Entertainment Tiny and Fabulous: It’s PERFECT if you need to travel with it and fits nicely on a tripod stand(not included). You can throw it in your backpack and take it for travelling without worrying about its weight. With the decent sound you would have thought you were at a drive-in. Attaching an external speaker to it without wires will definitely give you a more immersive theater experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for college dorm study breaks and entertainment nights!
reviews.reviewText: As a college student, the PURSHE Portable Projector has been a game-changer for me! Its compact size fits perfectly in my dorm or on-the-go movie magic. The high resolution and lumens make movie nights with friends a blast. It makes the movies look amazing! No more dealing with noisy projectors – the quiet fan is a lifesaver during study breaks. Setting up is super easy-just plug in my devices and voila! Another cool feature is the bluetooth which is perfect for streaming music wirelessly. The sleek white design adds a cool touch to my room, and its portability is ideal for impromptu movie nights in different dorms. You can throw it in your backpack and go! Definitely, a must-have for any college student looking for a reliable, immersive entertainment solution. College life just got a whole lot more entertaining!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I buy a lot of projectors and this one is one of the lowest priced ones I have ever purchased but it exceeds it's price for sure.First, about the price, WOW! Look, I get it, they have really expensive projectors out there that are brighter and have better contrast and color separation but you are not going to beat this much projector for $60. I have no shame in using this to entertain guest with a movie or a sporting event up on the big screen using this projector.It is pretty bright even with some sunlight coming through the curtains or with accent lights on in the room. I see no noticeable pixelation with normal viewing. I love the Bluetooth connectivity making wireless speaker connectivity simple.This projector has remote sensors on the front and rear of the unit which is smart and very handy.The attached pictures and the video show the projection to a wall in which you can see the textured wall in the closeup photo. What I found to be exceptional about this was the projector was bright enough that I had to get up close to the wall and look down the wall to even see the texture among the picture being projected on the wall.The picture of the motorcycle scene is being projected onto a screen and other than it being more white I cannot say that I would go to great lengths to put a screen up with this projector unless it was a really nice area and I wanted it to give off those theater vibes.I would and I do recommend this projector. You are not going to beat the price Vs. value of this projector and it is a multi-purpose projector for me and it will be used in many fun ways.It really does have everything you need to get going quickly including built in speakers. I only used them for a moment when I had not connected the bluetooth speakers when I first plugged it in. I will say that I prefer the external speakers, the built in speakers are just not able to give the stereo sound separation I like being so close to each other. I also really like my movies to be loud, these speakers would work fine in a quiet room like a meeting/conference room.I love this projector and I am very please with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best projector ever
reviews.reviewText: This mini projector is the perfect size to take along for travel, a movie night in the living room, a campsite or the backyard. You can project onto a blank white wall or white sheet and even onto the ceiling.I like bright colorful compact design. It stows away easily after use. You can use the HDMI to connect your laptop, phone, Amazon Fire stick, Apple TV and much more.The picture quality is clear and crisp and remains clear even when increasing the display size.The sound quality is good, loud and clear. I did not even need to use a Bluetooth Speaker for better sound. I enjoyed the Surround Stereo Sound option that makes you feel like you are in a movie theater.There is a low fan sound from the projector running, however it is not a nuisance.The projector has quick response time, warm, cool and cinema movie picture quality options. You can also share images and audio from another device.All in good, it is a good solid product at a budget friendly price!

reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The set up was easy enought, picture quality is great and adjustable! Sound is awesome too. The pictures shows the quality on my entire bedroom wall and I have no sheet or backdrop up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great projector! Easy to use, easy to connect - what a deal!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This projector was a *pleasant* surprise! For the price, I anticipated .... less, overall. Instead, the projector turned out to be well-built, compact (yet substantial-feeling), and supports a variety of connection types. Not to mention, built-in wifi connection - perfect for a quick setup. Once you've set it up on your home wifi (needs to be on the same wifi as the device you're connecting to), you just set it in place, power it up, tell it you're connecting via Miracast, and then fire up your Miracast/screen mirroring on your phone/tablet/laptop... the projector shows up on the list, select it, and ... away you go. No worrying about cords or adapters or tangles of wires. Plus, the handy remote helps reduce clutter, and trips to-from the projector.And - especially for the price - it's nicely bright. I included a video of a quick test-set-up in my kitchen... middle of the afternoon, shades not even drawn ... and the video's still nicely watchable. Of course, in a dim room you can expect a more vibrant picture, but this is surprisingly bright and powerful and definitely doesn't need a dark room.The keystone control is simple and effective - you can be fairly well off-center and still get a correctly-proportioned image. Plus, you can invert the image - useful when you want to hang the projector from the ceiling - and reverse the image for a rear-projection setup.All in all - *love* this projector! Great bang for the buck!
